lines: Mũndũ aigua nake nĩamũkĩrie, Hunjia thĩ yothe harĩa yakinya,
ĩria andũ othe gĩkeno gĩkĩ, ũrĩa ũkwenda nĩoke.
ũrĩa ũkwenda, ũrĩa ũkwenda, Anĩrĩra wega ng’ongo-inĩ ciothe
Ithe witũ ekuuga nĩwe Mũgaĩ, ũrĩa ũkwenda nĩoke.
ũrĩa wothe mwendi ndagaikare, Nĩ tondũ mũrango nĩmũhingũre
Atonye kwĩ Jesũ rũĩ rũ muoyo, ũrĩa ũkwenda nĩoke.
ũrĩa wothe mwendi erĩĩrũo muoyo, Angĩkirĩrĩria magerio wega,
Gũtĩrĩ kĩgiria kĩa ahingĩrio, ũrĩa ũkwenda nĩoke.
